title: Europe’s climate ambition needs industry that can invest in Europe [Promoted Content]
summary_full: Europe’s climate ambition depends on keeping industrial investment in Europe. Cement shows why competitiveness, predictable policy and strong demand are essential to deliver decarbonisation while preserving Europe’s industrial base and strategic autonomy.
